extendedInfo.description: If you are 98 Degrees's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check 98 Degrees's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all 98 Degrees's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of 98 Degrees's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- 98 Degrees- 98 Degrees And Rising- This Christmas- Revelation************************List of lyrics ************************- Always You And I- Ave Maria- Because Of You- Can You Imagine- Christmas Wish- Come & Get It- Completely- Dizzy- Do You Wanna Dance- Don't Stop The Love- Dreaming- Fly With Me- Give It Up (Interlude)- Give Me Just One Night (Una Noche)- God Rest Ye Merry Gentlemen- Hand In Hand- Heat It Up- Heaven's Missing An Angel- He'll Never Be...(What I Used to be to You)- I Do (Cherish You)- I Wanna Love You- I Wasn't Over You- If Every Day Could Be Christmas- If She Only Knew- I'll Be Home For Christmas- I'll Give It All (Interlude)- Intro- Invisible Man- Little Drummer Boy- My Everything- Never Givin' Up- Never Let Go- Oh Holy Night- She's Out Of My Life- Silent Night- Stay The Night- Still- Take My Breath Away- The Christmas Song- The Hardest Thing- The Way You Do- The Way You Want Me To- This Gift- To Me You're Everything- True To Your Heart- Was It Something I Didn't Say- Yesterday's Letter- You Don't Know- You Should Be Mine
